description: This app is the best app to make your own little game, or to make a model for minecraft, and it's awsome
I've used it in the past and I don't remember having any issues - just a nice intuitive experience. I haven't used it a lot recently but I imagine it to have only improved.

Be VERY weary about using this program. It frequently does not save my projects or properly export my models. How on earth does a mesh modeling software not have a proper robust saving function? It's literally the most important function of this kind of software. Mind boggling.
For me, this wouldn't detect Minecraft or save my toolbars. The AppImage works much better.

Siempre es grato encontrar software de tan buena calidad en GNU Linux, sus diferentes opciones como trabajar como Maya o Blender, permiten adaptarse rapido a quien ya conoce estas herramientas, poder exportar el modelo a impresión 3D es otra buena característica. En mi caso me gustaria poder exportar un modelo a papercraft, pero aun exploro las opciones, en todo caso es fantástico. Los amantes de exportar a videojuegos puede que encuentren interesante esta herramienta.
